abstract: Islamic State militants attack Swiss Inn Resort in Egypt's Northern Sinai peninsula, deploying explosives and gunfire, killing at least seven people.
lead_paragraph: Egypt’s Islamic State affiliate claimed responsibility for the assault at the hotel in El Arish, which was housing judges who were monitoring parliamentary elections.

headline.main: Militants Attack Hotel in Egypt’s Sinai Peninsula, Killing at Least 7
headline.print_headline: Militants Tied to ISIS Kill 7 at Sinai Hotel

snippet: Egypt’s Islamic State affiliate claimed responsibility for the assault at the hotel in El Arish, which was housing judges who were monitoring parliamentary elections.
